svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Absolute difference in global population estimates, UN vs. US Census
Absolute difference in global and regional population estimates between UN population division and US Census Bureau
sources, measured as UN minus US Census Bureau. Negative figures therefore indicate lower UN estimates relative to the US
Source: Differences in population estimates, OWID based on UN vs US Census Bureau
